Key Match Events: Son Heung-min scored twice as South Korea beat China 3-0.
Son Heung-min headed home a second goal just before the break.
Son Heung-min assisted Jung Seung-hyun's header in the 87th minute.
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Korea maintained their perfect start to 2026 World Cup qualifying.
South Korea top Group C with six points.
The match was played in front of a sell-out crowd of more than 40,000 in Shenzhen.
